::Rust::

Rust's eyes widen. "Colonel? I a-"

He jumps back as a sword cuts across his stomach, nearly tripping
over 
a tree as he does so. Growling, Rust's shoulder cannon takes aim 
again, firing a large blast at Dinotron.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Whistler::

him.  He 
> attempts to dodge but gets hit in the right shoulder by the beam.  
Thrown to 
> the ground he curses and yells "Stop this I am ... was... a
maximal.  
I am
